attributes.action: Return England to the world atlas!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to re instate England on the world map! And return to our country, our ability to carry out freedom of speech! and maintain our english values and way of life! The reason for starting this petition was that we were disgusted at the abuse our heroes took on their welcome home march! it's a dam disgrace!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
